name: Topicrawler
body:
### What is Topicrawler?
Topicrawler is a plugin for Heritrix 

### References
* Steffen Remus and Chris Biemann (2016): Domain-Specific Corpus Expansion with Focused Webcrawling. In _Proceedings of the Tenth International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC 2016)_, Protorož, Slovenia ([pdf](http://www.lrec-conf.org/proceedings/lrec2016/pdf/316_Paper.pdf), [lrec-proceeding](http://www.lrec-conf.org/proceedings/lrec2016/index.html))

### How to cite
Please use the following citation if you use the topicrawler for your project. Also we would like to hear from you if you use or plan to use the crawler.

Steffen Remus and Chris Biemann (2016): Domain-Specific Corpus Expansion with Focused Webcrawling. In _Proceedings of the Tenth International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC 2016)_, Protorož, Slovenia ([bib](https://github.com/tudarmstadt-lt/topicrawler/blob/gh-pages/reference.bib))

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/tudarmstadt-lt/topicrawler) and don't hesitate to contact us.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
